alert.note: Alert for Allen; East Cameron; Evangeline; Lafayette; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 5:45AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN CAMERON...NORTHWESTERN LAFAYETTE...JEFFERSON DAVIS...SOUTHERN EVANGELINE...ACADIA... SOUTHEASTERN CALCASIEU...VERMILION...SOUTHWESTERN ST. LANDRY AND SOUTHEASTERN ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 615 AM CST... At 545 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thornwell, or near Hayes, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Crowley, Abbeville, Eunice, Jennings, Scott, Rayne, Cameron, Kaplan, Church Point, Welsh, Iowa, Lake Arthur, Kinder, Basile, Oberlin, Iota, Gueydan, Elton, and Mermentau. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 45 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; East Cameron; Evangeline; Lafayette; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper Vermilion
